item.title: GOP blames Schumer for shutdown to appease 'Marxist flank' amid AOC primary challenge buzz
item.description: House Speaker Mike Johnson, R-La., accused Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer, R-N.Y., of shutting down the government to avoid a primary challenge.
